name: Touch The Sky (Candy✩Giants)
description:
Welp, another little minigame. I didn't realize Femicom was running until 12 hours to the deadline (and three hours to bedtime), but I wanted to make something anyway.

Click on clouds 'til the timer runs out! Clicking the bird increases restores five seconds.

CREDITS

Heartwarming Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
